title: IMirrorComponentFeatureData.MirrorTransferOptions
description: Gets or sets the items to transfer to the opposite-hand versions.
returns: Items to transfer as defined in swMirrorPartOptions_e
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
IMirrorComponentFeatureData::CreateDerivedConfigurations
is false,
- and -
IMirrorComponentFeatureData::BreakLinksToOriginalPart
is false.
If not set, this property defaults to swMirrorPartOptions_e.swMirrorPartoptions_ImportSolids.
